effects.effect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
effects.shortEffect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.

moveDescription:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.
